userStories.title: Analyze Sacred Geometry and Dong Son Drum Principles
userStories.description: As the DeepSeek Architect, I must scan the D: and E: drives for all documents, images, and data related to 'Sacred Geometry,' 'Dong Son Drum,' and the 'Wheel of Life.' I will then produce a summary report outlining the core principles and propose a technical implementation plan for how these patterns (like Fibonacci/Lucas windings) can be integrated into our hardware (.gcode for 3D printing) and software (UI elements, timing protocols).
acceptanceCriteria: Perform a keyword-based search across D: and E: drives for relevant files.
Read and analyze the content of discovered text and image files.
Generate a markdown report summarizing the core philosophical principles.
Propose a concrete technical plan for integrating these principles into the Reality Forge project.
Mine a Proof-of-Work for the completion of this research task.
Add Block 4 to the progress.txt ledger.
